Let $ a,b,c,d,e,f,g$ and $ h$ be distinct elements in the set\\
\[ \{ - 7, - 5, - 3, - 2,2,4,6,13\}.
\]What is the minimum possible value of\\
\[ (a + b + c + d)^2 + (e + f + g + h)^2
\]$ \textbf{(A)}\ 30\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 32\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 34\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 40\qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 50$
